description: This file defines a TrelloTools class that provides an interface to interact with Trello via the py-trello library. It includes methods for creating cards, retrieving board lists, moving cards, creating boards and lists, and listing boards, encapsulating Trello API operations within a toolkit class.

classes.name: TrelloTools
classes.description: A class that provides methods to interact with Trello, including creating cards, moving cards, listing boards, and creating boards and lists, extending the Toolkit class.

methods.name: create_card
methods.description: Creates a new Trello card in a specified board and list, returning card details as JSON or an error message.

methods.name: get_board_lists
methods.description: Retrieves all lists on a specified Trello board, returning their details as JSON.

methods.name: move_card
methods.description: Moves a specified card to a different list, returning the operation result as JSON.

methods.name: get_cards
methods.description: Retrieves all cards in a specified list, returning their details as JSON.

methods.name: create_board
methods.description: Creates a new Trello board, returning its details as JSON.

methods.name: create_list
methods.description: Creates a new list on a specified board, returning list details as JSON.

methods.name: list_boards
methods.description: Lists all boards for the authenticated user, returning details as JSON.
